lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : CRUSHER-P
[00:01.000] 作曲 : CRUSHER-P
[00:06.37]ECHO
[00:13.80]
[00:15.43]
[00:17.69]
[00:19.43]The clock stopped ticking, Forever ago.
[00:23.11]How long have I been up?
[00:24.92]I don't know.
[00:26.38]I can't get a grip, But I can't let go
[00:29.91]There wasn't anything To hold onto though...
[00:33.45]Why can't I see?
[00:35.29]Why can't I see?
[00:37.07]All the colors that you see?
[00:40.45]Please, Can I be,
[00:42.06]Please, Can I be Colorful and free
[00:47.15]WHAT THE HELL'S GOING ON?!
[00:48.70]CAN SOMEONE TELL ME PLEASE--
[00:50.74]WHY, I'M SWITCHING FASTER THAN THE CHANNELS ON TV!!
[00:53.89]I'M black, THEN I'M white!!
[00:55.60]
[00:55.91]SOMETHING ISN'T RIGHT!!
[00:57.36]MY ENEMY'S INVISIBLE, I DON'T KNOW HOW TO FIGHT!!
[01:00.68]THE TREMBLING FEAR IS MORE THAN I CAN TAKE
[01:04.45]WHEN I'M UP AGAINST THE ECHO IN THE MIRROR!!
[01:07.98]
[01:14.92]……
[02:23.18]I'm gonna burn my house down Into an ugly black.
[02:26.49]I'm gonna run away Now And never look back.
[02:29.83]I'm gonna burn my house down Into an ugly black.
[02:33.36]I'm gonna run away Now And never look back.
[02:36.68]I'm gonna burn my house down Into an ugly black.
[02:40.13]I'm gonna run away Now And never look back.
[02:43.59]I'm gonna burn my house down Into an ugly black.
[02:46.89]I'm gonna run away Now And never look back.
[02:50.58]I'm gonna burn my house down And never look back.
[02:53.79]And never look back.
[02:56.12]AND NEVER LOOK BACK!! o(>ω<)o
[02:57.16]WHAT THE HELL'S GOING ON?!
[02:59.34]CAN SOMEONE TELL ME PLEASE--
[03:00.74]WHY, I'M SWITCHING FASTER THAN THE CHANNELS ON TV!!
[03:04.06]I'M black, THEN I'M white!!
[03:05.74]
[03:06.02]SOMETHING ISN'T RIGHT!!
[03:07.65]MY ENEMY'S INVISIBLE, I DON'T KNOW HOW TO FIGHT!!
[03:10.96]WHAT THE HELL'S GOING ON?!
[03:12.72]CAN SOMEONE TELL ME PLEASE--
[03:14.65]WHY, I'M SWITCHING FASTER THAN THE CHANNELS ON TV!!
[03:17.92]I'M black, THEN I'M white!!
[03:19.51]
[03:20.10]SOMETHING ISN'T RIGHT!!
[03:21.56]MY ENEMY'S INVISIBLE, I DON'T KNOW HOW TO FIGHT!!
[03:24.68]THE TREMBLING FEAR IS MORE THAN I CAN TAKE
[03:28.57]WHEN I'M UP AGAINST THE ECHO IN THE MIRROR!!
[03:31.61]THE TREMBLING FEAR IS MORE THAN I CAN TAKE
[03:35.33]WHEN I'M UP AGAINST THE ECHO IN THE MIRROR!!
tlyric:
[by:奶罐喵]
[00:06.37]
[00:13.80]作词：Crusher-P
[00:15.43]作曲：Crusher-P
[00:17.69]编曲：Crusher-P
[00:19.43]在很久之前时钟就已停止转动
[00:23.11]我究竟起来（醒来）了多久？
[00:24.92]我不知道
[00:26.38]我无法将其守住 但亦无法放手
[00:29.91]没有任何东西值得我去坚持
[00:33.45]为何我目及不到？
[00:35.29]为何我目及不到？
[00:37.07]你所目及到的全部色彩？
[00:40.45]请问我能变得
[00:42.06]请问我能变得
[00:43.97]Colorful and.....free? 色彩斑斓的以及......自由的吗？
[00:47.15]究竟是怎么回事？！
[00:48.70]谁来告诉我好吗--
[00:50.74]为何我切换得比电视频道都要快
[00:53.89]我是黑色 尔后变成白色
[00:55.60]NO!!! 不！！！
[00:55.91]有什么不对劲！！
[00:57.36]我的敌人是无形的 我不知道如何去战斗
[01:00.68]颤栗着的恐惧已超出我的承受能力
[01:04.45]当我与镜子中的回声对峙
[01:07.98]ECHO!! 回声！！
[01:14.92]
[02:23.18]我必须把我的房子烧毁成狰狞的黑色
